about.title: About Your Nutritionist
about.description: With over 10 years of experience, I'm passionate about helping people achieve their health goals through personalized nutrition plans. My approach combines the latest scientific research with practical, sustainable lifestyle changes.

customMealPlans.description: Receive weekly meal plans tailored to your preferences, dietary requirements, and health goals.

progressTracking.description: Monitor your progress with our intuitive app, including metrics tracking and progress photos.

groupCoaching.description: Join like-minded individuals in our virtual group sessions for motivation and shared learning.
